§lBlast Protection III:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two TNT (R) and a piece of nether quartz (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top (L).
§lLLL
 B 
RrR§r

§lBlast Protection IV:§r
Place your book in the center (B) and use two TNT (R) and a scrap of netherite (r) as the reagents. Finish the enchantment with a row of lapis along the top and one on the left (L).
§lLLL
LB 
RrR§r
